title: New: East – Old Age
content:
Australia on point for the millionth time this year.

East is a relatively new artist from New South Wales, and aside from that, there’s not a huge amount of information, however believe me when I say, this is STACKED with potential. Her debut track, Old Age, just feels like it deserves to be blasted out at festivals all round the world. With a hook that CHVRCHES would kill for, and like Foxes but with more angst and personality, I’m on my tenth listen and head over heels in love. Check out Old Age below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
